# Release template

## What is included in this release
- Short summary of added/updated presets and units

## Highlights
- /units: mention the main .nts1mkiiunit files
- /docs: changes to installation or documentation

## Installation
- Short steps to use the .nts1mkiiunit files

## Changelog
- vX.Y — date — short list of changes

## Credits
- Author(s), contributors, references
